The Martian Chronicles:


Leaving behind a world on the brink of destruction, 

man came to the Red planet and found the Martians 

waiting, dreamlike. Seeking the promise of a new 

beginning, man brought with him his oldest fears and 

his deepest desires. Man conquered MarsÃ¢â‚¬â€and in that 

instant, Mars conquered him. The strange new world 

with its ancient, dying race and vast, red-gold 

deserts cast a spell on him, settled into his dreams, 

and changed him forever. Here are the captivating 

chronicles of man and MarsÃ¢â‚¬â€the modern classic by the
